title: Beautifully remodeled Bungalow in Madison Valley: move-in ready
posting_body: ['Bright Remodeled Charming Bungalow in Madison Valley', '*\t4-bedroom house: move-in ready', '*\tPerfect for a family or a group of friends', '*\tModern kitchen with a refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, and oven', '*\tFull sized washer & dryer', '*\t1.75 bathroom: 1 Master bathroom plus 3/4 bathroom downstairs', '*\tCentral forced air for heat with brand new heater', '*\tOne designated carport parking in the back and lots of free street parking in front', '*\tPaved private patio and fenced backyard with small garden', '*\tWood-fenced front yard with well-kept vegetation', '*\t~1,300 sq.', 'ft. in a 1,900 sq.', 'ft. lot', '*\tEnergy efficient double pane vinyl windows', '*\tBrand new water heater, furnace, and dryer', '*\tEasy access to highways: I-520, I-5, I-90 in Madison Valley', '*\tFew blocks from all the quaint French inspired stores on Madison Ave including Cafe Flora &amp', '*\tClose to bus lines #8 and #11', '*\tQuiet & safe neighborhood near Arboretum and Lake WA (enjoy a nice jog or walk!)', '*\tLess than 1 mile from McGilvra Elementary, Washington Middle, and Garfield High', '*\tRent: $3,500 for entire house', '*\tFully refundable deposit: $3,500', '*\tApplication Fees: $35/person OR $120/family', '*\tSend questions to MadisonHome AT <URL>', '*\tSee pictures and a video of the house at "https://1drv.ms/v/s!Aup_g_ZW4TS6gg-o3OOUKbGZp2Lp"', 'Please be advised that the pictures were taken with the help of an interior designer who prepared the place, and the beds, paintings, and decorations in the picture of rooms are not part of the rental offerings.', 'The house shares a wall in the kitchen side with another house.', 'This is a great location for a family or group of students (or friends) looking to be close to the city & enjoy the benefits of city life.', "It's very close to University of Washington, Seattle University, & Seattle Central Community College.", 'It is very easy to get to downtown or Capitol Hill.', 'We would require references from former landlords.', 'Other info:', '*\tMetro Route # 11 takes you into downtown Seattle, Capitol Hill/Broadway, and Madison Park', '*\tMetro Route # 8 gets you to Seattle Center, Group Health, Queen Anne, Capitol Hill, Madison Valley, Mt. Baker Transit center, and Rainier Beach', '*\t100% Walk Score-- Walk to Yoga places, Bars, Cafes, Restaurants, Grocery Stores & Boutiques']
